item.title: The Complete Ketogenic Diet for Beginners Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Amy Ramos
item.description: “The Complete Ketogenic Diet for Beginners: Your Essential Guide to Living the Keto Lifestyle” by Amy Ramos is a comprehensive guide that delves into the intricacies of the ketogenic diet, providing readers with a comprehensive understanding of the principles, benefits, and practical implementation of this popular dietary approach.
